function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection among building occupants","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air supply, maintain social distancing, and regular window opening","Technologies":"High-efficiency HVAC systems, air filtration systems, and outdoor air damper control","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management"}]}
